entries.townsperson_npc_go_home: Sorry it didn't work out for us.
entries.townsperson_npc_response_3_2: Well, I don't feel it.  Ohh, thinking about bantha's is making me sicker.  Excuse me...
entries.townsperson_npc_response_3_1: Thanks.  I hope you're also doing well.
entries.townsperson_npc_response_2_1: Actually, I think I need some time to myself to think...
entries.townsperson_player_line_3_2: Nonsense.  You look healthy as a bantha.
entries.townsperson_player_line_2_2: Oh.  Perhaps I shouldn't get to close to you.
entries.townsperson_npc_response_1_2: Well, I think I might be getting ill.
entries.townsperson_npc_response_1_1: Oh, things are going just fine I guess.
entries.townsperson_npc_job_offer_3: Well, if you're sure about it, there is something you can do for me.
entries.townsperson_npc_job_offer_2: I actually have thought of something you could do for me...
entries.townsperson_npc_job_offer_1: There is something that I'd been hoping someone would help me with.
entries.townsperson_npc_greet_3: Good to make your acquaintance.  Unless of course we've already met, and in that case, hello again.
entries.townsperson_npc_greet_2: Sorry, I'm not at all myself today.  What can I do for you?
entries.townsperson_npc_greet_1: Hello, hello.  How are you today?
entries.u25: I hear the Alliance is looking for more pilots.
entries.u23: I'm not clear on what I should be doing now.
entries.u20: Nothing interesting ever happens around here.
entries.u18: I wonder if I'm supposed to be somewhere...
entries.u17: Oh yes, she's a lovely girl.
entries.u16: Just need enough credits for one more drink...
entries.u14: I'd rather be eaten by rancors then pay that guy off.
entries.u13: Have you ever seen the inside of an imperial prison?  Me neither.
entries.u12: It looks like it's going to be a warm one today.
entries.u11: I have too much to do today.
entries.u10: I've been considering moving to a new city.
entries.u9: Well, this planet's not so bad.
entries.u8: My advice is, never gamble with a Hutt.
entries.u7: I think I might be getting sick.
entries.u4: I need a new book to read.
entries.u1: Oh, I haven't paid my taxes...
